text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Comptroller" means the Comptroller of the State.
"Eligible gubernatorial ticket" means a gubernatorial ticket that qualifies to receive a public contribution.
"Eligible private contribution" means that part of a monetary or in-kind contribution or series of contributions from an individual that does not exceed $250.
"Gubernatorial ticket" means a Governor-Lieutenant Governor unit.
"Public contribution" means money distributed from the Fund to a gubernatorial ticket under this title.
"Seed money" means cumulative eligible private contributions equaling 10% or more of the expenditure limit prescribed under § 15-105 of this title for an election.

section.section: "Treasurer" has the meaning stated in § 1-101 of this article.
